#summary Call it to reveal a secret entry to a player. 

{{{
doAllRevealState(revealEntries:Array/*RevealEntry*/)
}}}

To reveal a secret [ServerEntry] to a user, all players must call `doAllRevealState`  with the following parameters:


*revealEntries :* - an Array of [RevealEntry] elsements

all entries revealed this way, will have a `storedByUserId` set to -1
every [ServerEntry] which was already revealed to all the users in the 'userIds' array in the [RevealEntry]
is not sent to the users playing the game,because its state has not changed
